Container.Name: TaskFlow
Container.Overview: TaskFlow is a lightweight, self-hosted project and task management tool. No database required - all data is stored as flat JSON files. Features include project boards, task management, user roles, LDAP/AD integration, and multi-language support (DE/EN).

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for the TaskFlow web interface.

Config.Name: Data Storage
Config.Description: Persistent storage for TaskFlow data (users, projects, settings).

Config.Name: Admin Username
Config.Description: Username for the admin account (only used on first start).

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Password for the admin account (only used on first start). Change this before first start!

Config.Name: Admin Display Name
Config.Description: Display name for the admin account (only used on first start).

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for the container (e.g. Europe/Berlin, America/New_York).
